profile.title: Profile
profile.pageDescription: Manage your personal information and how others see you.
profile.name: Name
profile.errorConnection: Unable to connect to server. Please check your connection and try again.

emailChange.title: Confirm Email Change
emailChange.message: You are about to change your email address to
emailChange.warning: A verification email will be sent to your new address. You will be logged out and won't be able to log in until you verify your new email.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.themeDescription: Choose how Nametag looks to you
appearance.themeError: Failed to update theme. Please try again.
appearance.dateFormatDescription: Choose how dates are displayed throughout the app

security.title: Security
security.passwordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure.
security.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
security.passwordNeedsUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
security.passwordNeedsLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
security.passwordNeedsNumber: Password must contain at least one number
security.passwordNeedsSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character (!@#$%^&*)
security.errorConnection: Unable to connect to server. Please check your connection and try again.

carddav.title: CardDAV Sync
carddav.pageDescription: Sync your contacts with CardDAV servers like Google Contacts, iCloud, or Nextcloud.
carddav.appPasswordRequired: This provider requires an app-specific password
carddav.disconnectConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect? Your contacts in Nametag will not be deleted.
carddav.syncEnabledHelp: When enabled, contacts are synced automatically three times a day. You can also sync manually at any time.
carddav.autoExportNewLabel: Automatically export new contacts to CardDAV
carddav.autoExportNewHelp: When enabled, every new contact you create will be automatically sent to the CardDAV server.
carddav.syncIntervalHelp: How often to check for changes on the CardDAV server
carddav.importModeHelp: How to handle new contacts discovered on the CardDAV server
carddav.importModeNotify: Notify - Show notification when new contacts are found
carddav.syncPendingImports: {count, plural, =1 {1 contact pending import.} other {# contacts pending import.}}
carddav.syncError: Unable to sync. Please check your connection and try again.
carddav.syncDisabledWarning: Enable automatic sync to use this feature
carddav.troubleshootingCheckCredentials: Verify your username and password are correct
carddav.troubleshootingCheckUrl: Check that the server URL is correct
carddav.troubleshootingCheckNetwork: Ensure you have an active internet connection
carddav.troubleshootingCheckAppPassword: For Google and iCloud, make sure you're using an app-specific password
carddav.troubleshootingTestConnection: Try using the "Test Connection" button to diagnose the issue
carddav.emptyStateDescription: Connect to a CardDAV server to sync your contacts with Google, iCloud, Nextcloud, or other providers.
carddav.syncedContacts: {count, plural, =0 {No contacts synced} =1 {1 contact synced} other {# contacts synced}}
carddav.pendingImportsLink: {count, plural, =1 {1 pending import} other {# pending imports}}
carddav.fillAllFields: Fill all fields to test connection
carddav.testSuccessMessage: Connection test successful! You can now save.
carddav.disconnectConfirmMessage: Your contacts in Nametag will not be deleted. You can reconnect at any time.
carddav.importedCount: {count, plural, =0 {No contacts imported} =1 {1 contact imported} other {# contacts imported}}
carddav.importedTooltip: Contacts created on the server and pulled into Nametag as new people
carddav.exportedCount: {count, plural, =0 {No contacts exported} =1 {1 contact exported} other {# contacts exported}}
carddav.exportedTooltip: People created in Nametag and pushed to the CardDAV server as new contacts
carddav.updatedLocallyCount: {count, plural, =0 {No contacts updated locally} =1 {1 contact updated locally} other {# contacts updated locally}}
carddav.updatedLocallyTooltip: Contacts changed on the server, with changes pulled into Nametag
carddav.updatedRemotelyCount: {count, plural, =0 {No contacts updated remotely} =1 {1 contact updated remotely} other {# contacts updated remotely}}
carddav.updatedRemotelyTooltip: People changed in Nametag, with changes pushed to the CardDAV server
carddav.conflictsDetected: {count, plural, =1 {1 conflict detected} other {# conflicts detected}}
carddav.errorsOccurred: {count, plural, =1 {1 error occurred} other {# errors occurred}}

conflicts.title: Sync Conflicts
conflicts.name: Name
conflicts.chooseVersion: Which version do you want to keep?

import.title: Import Contacts
import.noPendingDescription: All contacts from your CardDAV server have been imported
import.description: {count} new contacts found on your CardDAV server
import.assignToGroupsDescription: Selected contacts will be added to these groups
import.noContactsSelected: Please select at least one contact to import
import.confirmLeave: You have unsaved selections. Are you sure you want to leave?
import.importSuccessToast: {imported, plural, =1 {1 contact imported successfully} other {# contacts imported successfully}}{skipped, plural, =0 {} =1 {, 1 duplicate skipped} other {, # duplicates skipped}}
import.importCompleteWithErrors: {imported, plural, =0 {No contacts imported} =1 {1 contact imported} other {# contacts imported}}, {errors, plural, =1 {1 error occurred} other {# errors occurred}}

notifications.newContactsFoundDescription: New contacts are available to import from your CardDAV server
notifications.autoExportDescription: Automatically export new contacts to CardDAV server

export.title: Bulk Export
export.nothingToExportDescription: All your contacts have been exported to CardDAV
export.description: {count} contacts available to export to CardDAV
export.noContactsSelected: Please select at least one contact to export

wizard.backupWarningTitle: Important: Back up your contacts first
wizard.backupWarningMessage: Syncing with Nametag may modify contacts on your server. We recommend downloading a backup of your server contacts before proceeding.
wizard.backupEmptyMessage: No contacts found on server. You can proceed without downloading a backup.
wizard.syncConfigDescription: Choose how Nametag syncs with your CardDAV server.
wizard.syncExplanation: When automatic sync is enabled, Nametag periodically checks your CardDAV server for changes and pushes local updates. Without it, syncing only happens when you manually click "Sync Now".
wizard.manualSyncExplanation: You can always trigger a manual sync from the CardDAV settings page regardless of this setting.
wizard.canChangeLater: You can change these settings later from the CardDAV settings page.

billing.title: Billing
billing.complimentaryMessage: You have been granted free unlimited access to all PRO features. No payment required.
billing.promoErrorGeneric: An error occurred. Please try again.

promoErrors.notActive: This promotion is no longer active
promoErrors.reachedLimit: This promotion has reached its redemption limit
promoErrors.notYetActive: This promotion is not yet active
promoErrors.alreadyHavePromo: You already have an active promotion

pricing.frequencySubtitle: Switch between monthly and yearly pricing
pricing.downgradeMessage: Cancel your current subscription to downgrade
pricing.checkoutErrorGeneric: An error occurred. Please try again.

account.title: Account
account.pageDescription: Export your data, import from a backup, or delete your account.
account.exportDescription: Download your contacts in JSON format (complete backup) or vCard format (for other apps).
account.jsonFormatDescription: Complete backup with all Nametag data (people, groups, relationships, custom fields, etc.). Use this to backup or transfer to another Nametag account.
account.vcardFormatDescription: Standard contact format for Apple Contacts, Google Contacts, Outlook, and other apps. Contains basic contact information only.
account.willExport: Will export people in selected groups, their group memberships, and relationships between them.
account.noDataToExport: No data to export. Add people or groups first.
account.importDescription: Import from a Nametag JSON backup or a vCard file from another app.
account.jsonImportDescription: Restores complete Nametag backup with all data (groups, relationships, custom fields). Merges with existing data.
account.vcardImportDescription: Imports contacts from vCard files (.vcf). Each contact becomes a new person. Relationships and custom fields are not preserved.
account.vcardImportNote: Importing vCard file. Each contact will be created as a new person.
account.clickToChooseDifferent: Click to choose a different file
account.willImport: Will import {count} {type}, people in {location}, and relationships between them.
account.importSuccess: Successfully imported {groups} groups, {people} people, and {types} custom relationship types
account.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
account.deleteWarningMessage: All your data including people, groups, relationships, and custom relationship types will be permanently deleted. We recommend exporting your data first.

vcardTest.title: vCard Parser Test
vcardTest.pageDescription: Upload and test vCard files to preview parsing behavior. This page is only available in development mode.
vcardTest.uploadDescription: Select a .vcf or .vcard file to test parsing
vcardTest.dropzone: Drop vCard file here, or click to select
vcardTest.clickToChooseDifferent: Click to choose a different file
vcardTest.parsedDescription: How this vCard will be interpreted by Nametag
vcardTest.unknownDescription: Properties that couldn't be mapped to Nametag fields (preserved in notes)

errors.invalidFile: Please upload a valid .vcf or .vcard file

about.title: About
about.viewChangelog: View the full changelog and release notes on GitHub:
about.openSourceDescription: Nametag is open source software licensed under AGPL-3.0. This means you can:
about.viewAndModify: View and modify the source code
about.contributeBack: Contribute improvements back to the community
about.foundBug: Found a bug or have a feature request?
about.supportMessage: If you find Nametag useful and want to support its development, you can buy me a coffee! ☕
about.supportNote: Your support helps keep this project alive and continuously improving!

emptyNetwork.title: Your network is empty
emptyNetwork.description: Start building your personal network by adding people you know.

people.title: People
people.limitReached: You've reached the limit of {limit} people.
people.noPeopleDescription: Start building your network by adding people you know. You can track their details, relationships, and stay connected.
people.orphanWarning: This person has no relationships and will be shown as isolated in the network graph
people.graphHelp: Click nodes to navigate • Drag to reposition • Scroll to zoom
people.deleteRelationshipConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the relationship with {name}? This will also remove the reverse relationship.
people.deletePersonConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
people.canRestoreWithin30Days: You can restore deleted items within 30 days.
people.orphanWarningNote: Note: Deleting this person will leave others without any relationships, showing them as isolated nodes in the network graph:
people.deleteFromCardDavServerDescription: If unchecked, the contact will be removed from Nametag but will remain on your CardDAV server and can be re-imported later.

form.knownThroughHelp: Select who connects you to this person. For example, if adding your friend's child, select your friend.
form.relationshipToYouTooltip: You can create custom relationship types in the Relationships section
form.indirectConnection: This person is connected to you through other people in your network, not directly.
form.willBeConnectedTo: This person will be connected to {name}, not directly to you.
form.remindMeToCatchUp: Remind me to catch up after
form.errorFutureDate: Last contact date cannot be in the future
form.errorConnection: Unable to connect to server. Please check your connection and try again.
form.successCreated: {name} has been added to your network
form.reminderLimitReached: Reminder limit reached ({limit}). Upgrade to add more.

groups.quickTipMessage: Don't see a group? Just type its name and press Enter to create it on the fly!
groups.placeholder: Type to search or create groups...
groups.helpText: Click × on a group to remove it.

importantDates.title: Title
importantDates.yearUnknownTooltip: When checked, you can still use the date picker, but only the month and day will be saved. The year you select will be ignored.
importantDates.onlyOnce: Only once on the specified date
importantDates.reminderLimitReached: Reminder limit reached ({limit}). Upgrade to add more.

customFields.label: Custom Fields
customFields.description: Add custom properties to this contact (stored as X- vCard fields)

people.qrCodeInstructions: Scan this QR code with your phone camera to save this contact

groups.title: Groups

form.addPeoplePlaceholder: Type a name to add people...
form.addPeopleHelp: You can add people to this group now, or do it later from the group details page.
form.errorConnection: Unable to connect to server. Please check your connection and try again.

members.label: Members ({count})
members.placeholder: Type a name to add members...
members.helpText: Type to search for people and press Enter to add them. Click × to remove members.

delete.title: Delete Group
delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete
delete.onlyGroupDeleted: This action will only remove the group, but will not delete the people themselves.
delete.deletePeopleToo: Delete all people in this group too
delete.errorGeneric: Failed to delete group. Please try again.
delete.errorConnection: Unable to connect to server. Please check your connection and try again.

groups.noGroupsDescription: Create groups to organize your network. Groups help you categorize people by family, friends, work, or any custom category.
groups.limitReached: You've reached the limit of {limit} groups.

relationshipTypes.title: Relationship Types
relationshipTypes.label: Label
relationshipTypes.noRelationshipTypesDescription: Create relationship types to categorize the connections in your network.

form.labelHelp: The name that will be displayed to users
form.symmetricHelp: Both directions will use the same label (e.g., Friend ↔ Friend)
form.nonSymmetricHelp: The reciprocal relationship (e.g., Parent ↔ Child, Mentor ↔ Student)
form.inversePlaceholder: Search existing or type to create new...
form.errorConnection: Unable to connect to server. Please check your connection and try again.

autocomplete.createNew: Press Enter to create new type: "{searchTerm}"

auth.welcomeSubtitle: Sign in to manage your relationships
auth.createAccountSubtitle: Start managing your relationships with Nametag
auth.verificationEmailSent: We've sent a verification link to {email}.
auth.verificationEmailInstructions: Please click the link in the email to verify your account before logging in.
auth.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: If an account exists for {email}, we've sent a password reset link.
auth.resetLinkExpiry: The link will expire in 1 hour.
auth.resetLinkInvalidOrExpired: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
auth.registrationDisabledMessage: Registration is currently disabled by the administrator. Please contact the site owner for access.
auth.passwordResetSuccessMessage: Your password has been updated. You can now log in with your new password.
auth.verificationFailed: Unable to verify email. Please try again.
auth.useVerificationLink: Please use the link from your verification email.

auth.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email before logging in
auth.accountLocked: Account locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Please contact support.
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
auth.unauthorized: You must be logged in to access this resource
auth.forbidden: You do not have permission to access this resource
auth.tokenExpired: Token has expired. Please request a new one.

password.tooShort: Password must be at least {min} characters
password.tooLong: Password must be less than {max} characters
password.requiresUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.requiresLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.requiresNumber: Password must contain at least one number
password.requiresSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
password.resetExpired: Password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
password.resetCooldown: Please wait {seconds} seconds before requesting another password reset

email.alreadyExists: An account with this email already exists
email.notFound: No account found with this email address
email.verificationSent: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox.
email.verificationExpired: Email verification link has expired. Please request a new one.
email.sendFailed: Failed to send email. Please try again later.
email.verifyCooldown: Please wait {seconds} seconds before requesting another verification email

resource.forbidden: You do not have permission to access this {resource}

person.alreadyExists: A person with this name already exists
person.relationshipRequired: Relationship to user is required for direct connections
person.cannotDeleteWithRelationships: Cannot delete person with existing relationships. Delete relationships first or choose to delete orphaned connections.

group.alreadyExists: A group with this name already exists
group.cannotDeleteWithMembers: Cannot delete group with members. Remove members first.

relationship.alreadyExists: Relationship already exists between these people
relationship.samePerson: Cannot create relationship with the same person

rateLimit.exceeded: Too many attempts. Please try again in {minutes} minute(s).
rateLimit.loginExceeded: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
rateLimit.registrationExceeded: Too many registration attempts. Please try again later.

data.importFailed: Failed to import data. Please check the file format.
data.exportFailed: Failed to export data. Please try again.
data.invalidFormat: Invalid data format. Please use the correct file format.
data.fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is {maxMB}MB.
data.parseError: Failed to parse data file. Please check the file format.

server.internalError: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
server.serviceUnavailable: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
server.databaseError: Database error. Please try again later.
server.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
server.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.

request.payloadTooLarge: Request body too large. Maximum size is {maxMB}MB.

feature.notImplemented: This feature is not yet implemented
feature.requiresUpgrade: This feature requires an account upgrade

auth.registered: Account created successfully. Please check your email to verify your account.
auth.emailVerified: Email verified successfully. You can now log in.
auth.passwordResetSent: Password reset email sent. Please check your inbox.
auth.passwordReset: Password reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.

common.footer: You're receiving this email because you have an account at Nametag.

verification.subject: Verify your Nametag account
verification.heading: Welcome to Nametag!
verification.body: Thanks for signing up! Please verify your email address to get started with managing your relationships.
verification.note: If you didn't create an account, you can safely ignore this email.

importantDateReminder.subject: Reminder: {personName}'s {eventType} is coming up
importantDateReminder.heading: Upcoming Event Reminder
importantDateReminder.body: Don't forget to reach out and make their day special!

contactReminder.subject: Time to catch up with {personName}
contactReminder.heading: Stay in Touch
contactReminder.body: It's been a while since you last contacted {personName}
contactReminder.infoBox: You asked to be reminded to catch up after {interval} of your last contact.
contactReminder.suggestion: Why not reach out today? A simple message can brighten someone's day.

passwordReset.subject: Reset your Nametag password
passwordReset.heading: Password Reset Request
passwordReset.body: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to set a new password:
passwordReset.infoBox: This link will expire in 1 hour.
passwordReset.note: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.

subscriptionCreated.subject: Welcome to Nametag {tierName}!
subscriptionCreated.heading: Welcome to Nametag {tierName}!
subscriptionCreated.body: Thank you for subscribing to Nametag. Your subscription is now active and you have access to all the features included in your plan.
subscriptionCreated.infoBox: Start managing your relationships more effectively today!
subscriptionCreated.note: If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our support team.

subscriptionChanged.subjectUpgrade: Your Nametag subscription has been upgraded
subscriptionChanged.subjectChange: Your Nametag subscription has been changed
subscriptionChanged.bodyUpgrade: Your Nametag subscription has been successfully upgraded.
subscriptionChanged.bodyChange: Your Nametag subscription has been changed.
subscriptionChanged.infoBoxUpgrade: Your new plan features are now available. Enjoy the expanded limits and capabilities!
subscriptionChanged.bodyChangeDetail: Your plan has been updated. You now have access to all {tierName} features.

subscriptionCanceled.subject: Your Nametag subscription has been canceled
subscriptionCanceled.heading: Subscription Canceled
subscriptionCanceled.bodyImmediate: Your Nametag {tierName} subscription has been canceled and your account has been downgraded to the Free plan.
subscriptionCanceled.bodyImmediateContinue: You can continue using Nametag with the Free plan features. If you'd like to resubscribe at any time, visit your billing settings.
subscriptionCanceled.bodyScheduled: Your Nametag {tierName} subscription has been canceled.
subscriptionCanceled.infoBox: Good news: You'll continue to have access to all {tierName} features until {accessUntil}.
subscriptionCanceled.bodyScheduledDetail: After this date, your account will be downgraded to the Free plan. You can resubscribe at any time from your billing settings.
subscriptionCanceled.note: We're sorry to see you go. If you have any feedback about your experience, we'd love to hear from you.

unsubscribe.pleaseWait: Please wait while we process your request.

success.title: Disabled Successfully
success.importantDate: You will no longer receive reminders for this event. You can re-enable this reminder anytime from your settings.
success.contact: You will no longer receive reminders to contact this person. You can re-enable this reminder anytime from your settings.

error.title: Unable to disable
error.invalid: This link is invalid. It may have been already used or doesn't exist.
error.alreadyUsed: This reminder has already been disabled.
error.expired: This link has expired. Please manage your reminder settings from your account.
error.network: A network error occurred. Please try again later.
error.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again or manage your settings from your account.
